briefTitle: Contraception and Cervical and Breast Cancer Screening in Obese Versus Non-obese Women
officialTitle: Contraception and Cervical and Breast Cancer Screening in Obese Versus Non-obese Women Aged 25 to 74 Years Old
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

* women from 25 to 74 years old
* BMI ≥ 18,5
* agree to participate in the study when they consult their endocrinologist or general practitioner.

Exclusion criteria:

* Subject opposition
* Subject in guardianship or trusteeship
* Women \< 25 years of age and \> 74 years of age
* Women with a BMI \< 18.5 kg/m2
* Women with a history of breast or cervical cancer or hysterectomy.
